def: One who encourages, incites, or helps forward; a favorer.The pope is . . . a great encourager of arts. Addison.
The science of tongues or languages; comparative philology;glossology.
To determine beforehand, especially to disadvantage; toprejudge.Our dearest friend Prejudicates the business. Shak.
The affection of the system with cancer.
The hoary, or northern, marmot (Arctomys pruinosus).
A measure of capacity, equal to ten steres, or ten cubicmeters.
Paper chewed, and rolled into a ball, to be thrown as amissile.
The quality of being deducible; deducibility.
Lying or being beyond the sea. Howell.
A basin at the entrance of Roman Catholic churches forcontaining the holy water with which those who enter, dipping theirfingers in it, cross themselves; -- called also holy-water stoup.
